mods.abstract: Two color window card (green and light green on white) announcing Billy Block's Western Beat American Music Showcase featuring Edward Tree, Mark Fosson, the Bum Steers, Karen Tobin, Eddie Cunningham, Zydeco Party Band, Lois Blaisch, Jon Strider, Craig Lackey, Muffin Robin Pearl, Paul Marshall, Merrilee Weeber, Teresa James, Terry Wilson, and Steve Cochran hosted by Billy Block at Highland Grounds on September 3. Poster features woodcuts of stars and a dancer and a metal photoplate of the Western Beat logo.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
